snippet: A group of 32 teenagers crawled under a fence at the Woodland Hills Youth Development Center in Nashville, but most were recaptured.
abstract: Group of 32 teenage offenders escape Nashville detention center by crawling through a spot beneath a fence where dirt had been removed; officials are trying to determine whether escape was planned; authorities report that all but eight teens have been recaptured.
lead_paragraph: A group of 32 teenagers crawled under a fence at the Woodland Hills Youth Development Center in Nashville, but most were recaptured.

headline.main: 8 Youths on Run in Tennessee After Detention Center Escape
headline.print_headline: 8 Youths on Run in Tennessee After Detention Center Escape

keywords.value: Woodland Hills Youth Development Center (Nashville, Tenn)
